name: Hellfire Rampage
summary: Hellfire Rampage is a thrilling VR adventure where you, an inventor of a teleportation, seek the world's most valuable crystals.  Navigate dungeons guarded by hellish creatures using a diverse arsenal to combat enemies with unique behaviors.  Each crystal unlocks a portal to the monster's base.  Conquer challenges, defeat enemies, and collect exclusive glove skins.   This immersive journey combines fighting and shooting elements, offering an exhilarating experience.
